channel.title: How can i start my server?
channel.description:
i followed the tut and did everything it said but when i tryed to log in it said "error connecting to server. must be down. yada yada you know the rest. :(
can anyone tell me how i can start this server?
by the way im a noob at this stuuf kinda as you can easly tell..

item.title: How can i start my server?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_BaldwinC Mod BaldwinC
item.description:
@Mod_BaldwinC wrote:

Do You have these files (i am not listing programs needed for others to play, as it is not your question):
MoparScape 3.1
Source
thats it

Now for you to get on:
go into your Source file and double click runserver.bat
and it should say
Starting “Source” Server on port 43594
then you can log in with on you moparscape
port: 43594
ip: your ip… if you want to know this get a no-ip program and thats how i know my ip

Read full topic
item.source: How can i start my server?
